textBeforeTable: AbstractAdapter specs: rmvn rake spec -- -o or rmvn rspec spec/ Test suites: Specs how to list rake tasks (please note the jruby.rake.args part(var name)) rmvn rake -T -- -o Rake Howtos: use FORMAT_SQL=true ENV variable in order to format SQL logs use SHOW_SQL=true ENV variable in order to log SQL (except DDL, turned off by default) Logging Don't use -o if you want to access remote repositories The ruby-maven setup will generate a pom.xml which can be used by proper maven3. ruby-maven setup the gems and compile the java extension rmvn clean gem:initialize compile -- -Djruby.version=1.6.4 Install ruby-maven wrapper jruby -S gem install ruby-maven Installation: dm-hibernate-adapter aka jibernate README.md pom.xml dm-hibernate-adapter.gemspec
textAfterTable: Tips: when using rmvn test there will be a nice html rspec report in target/rspec-report.html. to get debug output use (use '--' only once which denotes the beginning of maven options) -- -Djruby.verbose -e you can switch the jruby version by adding to the above commands -- -Djruby.version=1.6.3 if you are getting OutOfMemory errors, you should try to tune jruby-maven-plugin's settings and set them as properties in 'Mavenfile' - see in that file (ie. properties['jruby.jvmargs'] = '-Xmx1024m') if you are getting problems with specs you can skip that phase: -- -Dmaven.test.skip=true Authors Authors listed in dm-hibernate-adapter.gemspec file (in random order).
